articles.title: Tony Finau wins Rocket Mortgage for second straight PGA Tour victory
articles.description: Tony Finau became the first PGA Tour player in three years to win consecutive regular-season events with his Rocket Mortgage Classic victory on Sunday.
articles.content:
DETROIT -- Tony Finau ran away with the Rocket Mortgage Classic on Sunday at Detroit Golf Club to become the first PGA Tour player in three years to win consecutive regular-season events.

articles.title: Ruling in Cleveland Browns QB Deshaun Watson's disciplinary case expected Monday, sources say
articles.description: NFL disciplinary officer Sue L. Robinson is expected to issue a decision Monday on whether Browns quarterback Deshaun Watson violated the league's personal conduct policy, sources told ESPN, confirming a CBS Sports report.

articles.title: Los Angeles Angels starter Reid Detmers records immaculate inning against Texas Rangers
articles.description: Los Angeles Angels starter Reid Detmers became the first pitcher in seven years with a no-hitter and an immaculate inning in the same season, achieving the latter against the Texas Rangers on Sunday.
